page.title: 13Our School (sheet 3)
page.content: In our school we do a lot of sport.In the winter the boys play Association Football and the girls play Netball.In the summer the boys and girls play rounders. We also do swimming and athletics. We have an infants and a junior sports day,and an infant and junior swimming gala.Every year we produce a play.In our school we have got a hall where we do physical education. We do vaulting over a vaulting horse, climbing up ropes,walking along the balance beam,climbing the window bars and running and jumping over the ramp. The outdoor activities we do are high jump,long jump,throwing,skipping, triple jump,running,standing long jump,vertical jump and cricket. In athletics we get awards for getting a certain amount of points. by Hilary Taylor and Gary Perry.
